head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials BOXER, ROBERT, M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials BOXER, ROBERT, M.D.

block.p: BOXER--Robert, M.D. 2/7/05 It's been 2yrs since you left us, dearest son. We were beside you w/love & spirit & will be forever. We miss your beautiful smile, love, kindness & are thankful for the wonderful memories each day. We mourn your death, but celebrate your life. We know you're happy continuing your life's work in a better place. Love Mother & Dad
